name: The Whisker War...
description:
The cats... are coming...

The cats are on the offensive, they have risen up to try to take over the world! It's up to you to stop them, using your wits and strategy.

Gameplay: Play by using alchemy to make potions, using botany to plant plants, and using strategy to defeat that cats.

Click on the cauldron to get potions, which do big splash damage to hoards of cats. Click on pots to grow plants, but beware, as they need water. Every action takes a turn, and each round you'll have 3 turns to prepare. You can view the next 3 waves of cats, so make sure to stratagize!

I made this game for tired dice, who loves plants, has 2 cats, and wanted a game with short term strategy. I hope this game lived up to that!

I got some help for the music from the awesome Namae and Charbomber!

For most of the game I used Namae's - "Ever So Slightly" under https://creativecommons.org/licenses/ Check out Namae on sound cloud! https://soundcloud.com/namae-157651192

For the final level and the boss fight I used Charbomber's "Gather Your Strength" 

Thanks for playing!

Made with love <3
